name: Demon Massacre
description:
A short, single screen, game where you control Nyx, a woman with magical abilities. Defeat the incoming demons and claim victory in my very first game!

This game is more of a learning process than a completed product. 

Controls:

  • Arrows to move 
  • Esc to pause
  • Space to jump
  • Z to fire

(The game will be updated with music as the music is finished)
